name: Flourish 2.0
description:
Play as a seed creature trying to find his way through a corrupted garden, making your way with special seed items to conquer the seeds of doubt and find a place to grow.

Quick Instructions:

 WASD - movement

"F" key - Ground Pound

Left Click Mouse - aim/throw sprout seed

Right Click Mouse - aim/throw pollen seeds

"E" key - picking up and putting down seeds

(note: gamepad controls are not set up properly. The item UI is outdated.)
